text: Adalbert is a Germanic name that has been used since the Middle Ages. ==Origin== The name is derived from the Old High German words adal meaning "noble" and beraht meaning "bright." Adalbert has a rich history and is associated with many notable figures throughout the ages. == People == * Adalbert Begas (1836–1888), German painter * Adalbert Czerny (1863–1941), Austrian pediatrician * Adalbert Deșu (1909–1937), Romanian football player ==References== Category:Names
title: Adalbert
